<p style="text-align:start;" size="1">The time has arrived! You can claim one month of Discord Nitro on us. After a few short steps, start enjoying custom profiles, HD streaming, custom emoji, larger file uploads, and more Nitro perks!</p>
<p style="padding:7.5px;"></p>
<p style="text-align:start;text-indent:2em;" dir="ltr">How to redeem: </p>
<ol>
<li>This offer is valid for Discord users who have not subscribed to Nitro within the past 12 months, subject to Discord <a href="https://e.acct.epicgames.com/click?" target="">Terms of Service</a> and <a href="https://e.acct.epicgames.com/click?" target="">Privacy Policy</a>. </li>
<li>Create a Discord account or log in if you already have one.</li>
<li>Click the Nitro Giveaway button or copy and paste the link into your browser and follow the instructions on the page.</li>
<li>If eligible, the 1 month subscription will be automatically added to your account.</li>
<li>Now, kick back and enjoy those sweet Discord Nitro perks!</li>
</ol>
<p style="padding:7.5px;"></p>
<p style="text-align:center;" size="0"><a href="https://e.acct.epicgames.com/click?" target="_blank"><span data-link="https://promos.discord.gg/XNFvzfKQqQr52a7RXDQP3uWS" style="display:inline-block;background:#0078f2;color:#ffffff;font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.2;margin:0;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none;padding:10px 45px 10px 45px;border-radius:3px;box-sizing:border-box;">Redeem Now</span></a></p>
<p style="padding:7.5px;"></p>
<p style="padding:7.5px;"></p>
<p>Nitro Offer ends December 17, 2024 at 11:00 AM EDT and codes expire January 16, 2025 at</p>
<p>11:59 PM EDT. Offer valid for new and returning Nitro users. Subscription auto-renews for</p>
<p>$9.99/month unless canceled. See <a href="https://e.acct.epicgames.com/click?" target="">FAQ</a> for details.</p>
